urlLink Gr. *Shudder* Why did they put lions to guard Columbus' statue? He's not famous because he went to Africa, or Italy. These people are very confused. urlLink

urlLink Well, Mika was trying to take pictures of me with the dumb-ass glasses on, but she was laughing so hard that THIS was the result. Three perfectly good (!!!) pictures turned into blurry messes. Is there no justice in this cold, hard world? urlLink
urlLink Yeah, nice. Sure thing. You know, glasses like this should be illegal. urlLink
urlLink I am the most cooperative person in the world for putting this one up. TheyÂ´re 3D glasses at Imax, okay? Anyone have a problem with that? urlLink
urlLink Itï¿½s a bar that looks like a forest inside. urlLink
urlLink Chinese place of eating. urlLink

urlLink Ew. Mushrooms and other foods that are not meat. urlLink

urlLink Human statue dude on the Rambla in Barcelona. urlLink
urlLink Nap time... or maybe we humans are a little more boring than we thought. urlLink
urlLink 'Five more stairs? But I'm tired NOW.' urlLink
urlLink Pink. Very pink. Makes those ladies from 'Grease' look kind of washed out. urlLink
urlLink Colorful duck with green stuff. Mmm, lots of yummy looking food! urlLink
urlLink Can I live in YOUR yard? urlLink
urlLink Those things that people put in their yards to make them look festive. urlLink
urlLink LONG NECKS are, like, so cool. urlLink
urlLink This is a look of resignation, folks, after an unforgiving sequence of awful pictures. urlLink

urlLink European zoos are very different. Apparently the natives punish their young by... yeah, well, you see. urlLink
urlLink There was a guy with a bucket of fish getting ready to feed them. That would by why they're so excited. urlLink
urlLink When you lose your skin, life is like a Harry Potter book. Donï¿½t ask me why, because I donï¿½t know. urlLink
urlLink Oh my... urlLink
urlLink Snake. My snake is big. urlLink
urlLink 'So hungry...'. Ha, crazy lizards. urlLink
urlLink Okay, so I was waving and this friendly little dude waved back. Then he went and hid. I think the interaction tired him out. urlLink
urlLink 'I like rocks, I am a lizard...' urlLink
urlLink :( or ? ) . Take your pick. urlLink
urlLink 'I wish I had an opposable thumb...' urlLink
urlLink Philosophical looking monkey. urlLink
urlLink It was a quiet day, so what do you expect the poor monkeys to do for fun? urlLink
urlLink Monkey supermodels... who knew? urlLink
urlLink Apparently there was a photo shoot for the jungle edition of 'Playboy' going on that day. urlLink
urlLink A big cemetary mountain outside of Barcelona. To reserve your space, call now. Operators are standing by. www.ebolaworld.com urlLink
urlLink The little ones and the new mommy (assuming she accepts them and all, which it would be hard not to because theyï¿½re so soft and they make nice noises and produce lots of poop). urlLink
urlLink 'Erm, guys, I think this is bigger than the box... SWEET!!!' urlLink

urlLink 'Welcome home, ya little buggers...' urlLink
urlLink We call her Eggy, on account of she lays eggs and all. urlLink
urlLink Eggs, The Next Generation. Erm, and Mika was really nice and made air holes for them. urlLink
urlLink The flower is pretty, Andy is a bad photographer, and that blurry thing in the foreground is a spider. urlLink

urlLink It was kind of crowded up there. urlLink
urlLink Feet in a tree. What more explanation could you possibly want? urlLink
urlLink When we heard that a comet was going to end life as we know it in a few weeks, we figured it would be safer if we climbed a tree. urlLink
urlLink Mmm hmm. We went there. The footprint is STILL there. urlLink
urlLink Falling sand, Mika, and a long exposure time. Looks like she's making a sculpture of some kind. Could be an alien. We'll get back to you once we know more. urlLink
urlLink Andy playing with sand. Andy the Sandy, they called him. Shut up. urlLink
urlLink Waves. urlLink
urlLink Full moon, waves, sand, a castle, and the blackness that IS the mother of all that which seeks to dwell within the infernal house of the... gimme drugs. urlLink
urlLink I don't know. Io, Mars, beach. urlLink
urlLink Zzzzzzzz. Sleeepy litttle village. urlLink
urlLink It's a F$%kin' army of boats, tio. urlLink
urlLink Beach, waves, night. Cambrils. urlLink
urlLink Ah, the good old ...AT.4.1511. urlLink
urlLink No, THIS is the meaning of life. Actually, it would be better if you turned it upside down. urlLink
urlLink Wzzzzzz. That what SHE said. ------> urlLink

urlLink Dimensional shifty stuff. What is happening to this crazy world? urlLink
urlLink Get it? Ze GREEN lighthouse. Not the red one!!!! urlLink
urlLink Das Bootz. urlLink
urlLink Lights at night; Cambrils, as seen from the Green lighthouse (not the red one). urlLink
urlLink Omni-ous. Erm, ominous. Whatever. urlLink
urlLink A beach in Cambrils, at dusk. Please note the ice bergs. urlLink
urlLink The finished deal. Now the Sun wonÂ´t shine on the pipe and cause thermal expansion and contraction in an awful cycle of violence that will eventually break the pipe. Get it? urlLink

urlLink Chispa HATES gloves, because when she picks them up and shakes them, they slap her, and that only makes her angrier. A perfect example of the awful cycle of violence that inflicts dogs and American presidents alike. Except Chispa doesn't actually hurt anyone. I think Chispa should be the president of the US. She would certainly be better than what's his face. I mean, a Â¨War on GlovesÂ¨ makes more sense than a Â¨War on TerrorÂ¨. At least gloves actually EXIST as concrete objects that can be Â¨defeatedÂ¨! I mean GOD, how can you declare war on a CONCEPT or an emotion!? Terror... oi vay. I will now yield the floor to my collegue, Mr. Hat, the gentleman from Tasmania. He is here to talk about the war his son has declared on the monsters that live under his bed. THAT makes more sense than the Â¨War on TerrorÂ¨ too. urlLink

urlLink Oh, look, she's holding a rock. Will wonders never cease? This is a testament to the strength that lives within each one of us. You, too, can lift rocks. I believe in you. Ah, shut up or I'll sick the guy with the hammer and the crazy look on you. urlLink
urlLink Oh, look, I'm holding a rock. Isn't that special... urlLink
urlLink Spooky. See the look on that guy's face? I think he hates rocks. It's like, dude, what is he going to do with that hammer!? urlLink
urlLink Yes, they ARE rocks. Why do you care? Because they happen to be irregular. That's why. urlLink
urlLink So, the idea was to cover the little canal up with the stones. It was thirteen and a half barrels of fun. Like the puzzle from HELL. urlLink
urlLink Luna doesn't like yard work. urlLink
urlLink This is Chispa after she bit the table. She was hungry, and the humans were engaged in a conspiracy to starve her. urlLink

urlLink Yes, exactly. I don't think any of you have ever seen peas before. That is EXACTLY why we posted this picture. JEEZE. They're peas, okay, and they're the results of a great deal of toil. urlLink
urlLink Dude it's like a solar eclipse with peas or something and... they came from the garden. urlLink
urlLink Peas and garlic and Chispa. urlLink
urlLink Some people like to shell peas. Notice that, even when she's happy, she keeps a sharp object at her side. urlLink
urlLink DON'T even think about saying anything (!!!). urlLink
urlLink Dogarden. urlLink
urlLink Snail vibrator. You know what I mean *wink wink* . urlLink
urlLink So much hard work and no lollipop? I'd be ready to impale people too. urlLink
urlLink "Duh?" Her name is Luna, and don't your forget it. urlLink
urlLink Tiller McMika? urlLink
urlLink Multi-... flower. urlLink
urlLink Tri-chloro-b... flower. urlLink
urlLink Hens. They eat the food. Find Eggy ;) . urlLink
urlLink Hen food. This is SO interesting! urlLink
urlLink 'Copula, Copulorum' urlLink
urlLink Me carry heavy big sack man with lettuce food for Eggy and company. urlLink
urlLink These are berries. At least the wild boar left someone alive. urlLink
urlLink Some people like to paint pictures. Some people like to garden. And some people like to impale. urlLink
urlLink Mika's garden, before we did stuff to it. urlLink
urlLink Information overload! urlLink
urlLink Part of the Forum in Barcelona urlLink
urlLink I dunno what it says either. urlLink
urlLink Yes, I are apple. You am too. But the lady over there is a pear. urlLink
urlLink Yep. For a free hat, which two kinds of peace are being talked about here? urlLink
urlLink Ladder snake (Elaphe scalaris). Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!A. urlLink
urlLink Also the... ZEE lake. You can drink from it. urlLink
urlLink Dur snake was looking at us. The creepy reptile was probably plotting our destruction. urlLink
urlLink Zee lake, on the property next to the sanctuary. urlLink
urlLink The HMS Luna? urlLink
urlLink We were wondering if it was a leaf, you know. It's not a leaf, it's a... oh my GOD!!! urlLink
urlLink "Gimme hug", said the little girl. urlLink
urlLink Weird trees. I prefer real leaves. urlLink
urlLink And now the children of the Urth are reaching out into the universe, consuming everything in sight just like we consumed our lunch (see below). urlLink
urlLink Oh look it's the "rainbow" of people "dancing" with each other. urlLink
urlLink Kids draw pictures about water and stuff. And they get publicity. urlLink
urlLink UGLY!!! Well, no, not THIS part, but the rest of it was. urlLink
urlLink For the site of a peace and diversity forum, this place was pretty fuckin' ugly. urlLink
urlLink In case you're differently abled and you didn't understand how big the Forum was the first time we said it, here you go. Get it? urlLink
urlLink Yessssssssss. urlLink
urlLink "The tragedy of modern man is not that he knows less and less about the meaning of his own life, but that it bothers him less and less."-Vaclav Havel Yep. Preach it Brother Vaclav. urlLink
urlLink I don't know ANYTHING. Does that mean I get a PhD? urlLink
urlLink Some people enjoy stealing Andy's water. urlLink
urlLink Mika took his water, and she wouldn't get him ice cream, and he was hot. Shut UP! urlLink
urlLink We are consumers. There was a lunch there. WE consumed it. urlLink
urlLink Big Forum. Long journey. Tiring. Hot sun. Salty water. urlLink

urlLink A giant wall of painted faces. They were once people like you and me, until they reached the age of 21 and failed to purchase their first Toyota. The penalty: imprisonment eternal in the wall of fame (faces? f...) urlLink
urlLink Huh? urlLink
urlLink Obsessive orange stackers for peace! urlLink
urlLink Okay, so it's like the Blue Man group, except they're not all men, and they don't play drums, and they're not Intel's slaves. urlLink
urlLink People. So many people. Sons of Adam, Daughters of Eve, unite (unity will take place on Tuesday, 6:30 PM, near the big blue thing; BYOB). urlLink
urlLink It is... it is... ? It is... It is blue. The screens are BIG. BIG, blue screens. urlLink
urlLink The planet Urth. They had very dramatic music playing. Urth is like that. urlLink
urlLink Hippies. urlLink
urlLink Be very careful where you park this one. Studies show that nine out of ten car thiefs prefer Toyota (r) vehicles. urlLink
urlLink Did you know that owning a Toyota also makes God more likely to forgive your sins? urlLink
urlLink We'll be getting this one :) . urlLink
urlLink Studies by Toyota scientists have shown that owning a Toyota improves your complexion and improves test scores. This one is really pretty, don't you think? urlLink
urlLink Buy a Toyota, save the Earth. Brought to you by the Toyota propaganda building at the Forum, Barcelona, Spain. urlLink
urlLink No, he didn't fall. He had shoe things, anti-gravity boots, magic slippers, something like that. urlLink
urlLink Mika did it. urlLink
urlLink The big fish robot. It smell like they were cooking a REAL big fish somewhere nearby. urlLink
urlLink Mika with a virtual, elderly gentleman. urlLink
urlLink Big solar panel thing. Deep into yourself you must look, to discover why this picture is important. Yeeees. urlLink
urlLink Sandcastles for peace! That'll show 'um. urlLink
urlLink Is it? Dunno. Doubtful. Peekaboo! urlLink
urlLink Yes, we do. We've been a good boy this year. urlLink
urlLink Catalan flag. Andy's hand is in the flag. urlLink
urlLink It does not make sense. Period. urlLink
urlLink Looks like a bunch of kids had crafts hour at school. urlLink
urlLink Lots of people hung stuff. It was quite lovely. It symbolizes hope, somehow. urlLink
urlLink All about water. 132 faucets is better than one. urlLink
urlLink Sooooo interesting. urlLink
urlLink Andy on the side of the picture, because Mika likes to take pictures where people are on the side. urlLink
urlLink People like to climb on these. Would you like to climb on them? PLEASE say yes. urlLink
urlLink Creepy, kind of. urlLink
urlLink WOOOOOOOOOOWWWW. At night. urlLink
urlLink It's a lamp. But hey, it's a lamp in Sitges! urlLink
urlLink Whoaaaaa! urlLink
urlLink Once Mika went there and she helped buy a catamaran. urlLink
urlLink They go somewhere, Andy knows it. urlLink
urlLink Hobbits? urlLink
urlLink Well they must go somewhere, eh? I mean, they're stairs. urlLink
urlLink White houses are cooler than black houses (first principle of home design). urlLink
urlLink Whoa, it's like... a building floating in the air. urlLink
urlLink Oh my god the building is eating her! She's trying to fight back, but... will she get out? urlLink
urlLink Sea, Andy, Shakti, Govi. Picture courtesy of Mika. urlLink
urlLink What kind of a story do you think inspired this? urlLink
urlLink Huh...not mopping. He's killing a dragon, he's George, St-George of Sitges. urlLink
urlLink The old garrison at Shitcheese. The town symbol looks like a guy mopping. urlLink
urlLink Long hairs, nice sea. urlLink
urlLink Wucking fater reaten BOCKS! urlLink
urlLink Beautiful color gradient, doncha think? urlLink
urlLink Nice rocks, nice sea, nice blue. Nice Andy. Embrace the tide! urlLink
urlLink Nice picture, nice sea, nice blue, nice wall, nice...no, "no war". No more boom sticks. urlLink
urlLink See the kite? Well, the guy is sort of tied to the kite, and it works... urlLink
urlLink Wanna try it?...No way! urlLink
urlLink Come on, you know you want to buy this picture and use it for advertising. urlLink
urlLink Once upon a time, in a little town called Shitcheese, there lived a... what? "Sitges". Uh oh. urlLink
urlLink The artist here made excellent use of line and color. urlLink
urlLink There is something about looking out to open sea. The slab of stone isn't very important, unless you're a Catholic. urlLink
urlLink Hot. Praying. No. Not praying. HOt. urlLink
urlLink Rohan, I think. Yeah, definitely. urlLink
urlLink Don't sit on these. They are sharp. urlLink
urlLink Si. The Cat again. urlLink

urlLink I want that mail box! urlLink
urlLink Rocksies! Or... the three kings. Oh my god I see the light. It's up there. urlLink
urlLink Jesus Christ, this was a big mountain. 1543 steps or something. urlLink
urlLink An inside-out knight. I wonder why this one is so awesome. urlLink
urlLink Now you don't. Pay no attention to the man making the funny hand signs. urlLink
urlLink Now you see him... urlLink
urlLink Eh. "The labyrinth is in the mind of the monk." -Govi urlLink
urlLink Montserrat: 1 . Monks: 0 . The mountains are MUCH nicer than the trappings of the pious. urlLink
urlLink A Spanish Lancelot, perhaps. urlLink
urlLink This is the room where you bring stuff if the mountain grants your wishes. urlLink
urlLink She's so nice. She's helping the old lady. Saint Holy Reverend Mother Mika. urlLink
urlLink Holy Reverend Mother Mika. She wished for urlLink
urlLink Saint Andy. That's what I wished for, anyway. Bwahahaahaha. urlLink
urlLink Candles for peace. Candles for love. Candles for that new baby or a new bride or a new hat. Candles for a raise. Candles for burning. Wanna make a wish? urlLink
urlLink Mika likes this one too. She likes ceilings and lights...in the ceiling. urlLink
urlLink It's a tough job, holding up a metal pole. urlLink
urlLink Mika likes this one. urlLink
urlLink Oh Holy Water, purify me and... it tasted like normal water. urlLink
urlLink "Don't worry. Be happy..." urlLink
urlLink Hmm... looks like she's considering a change of occupation or something. urlLink
urlLink At least there's something colorful. Note the dragons at the bottom. urlLink
urlLink They all look so sad. The guys in blue cloaks used to work on the Rambla in Barcelona, then they got promoted. urlLink
urlLink Oh look the nice man needs to look at floating kids for his wisdom/meaning and all that. And now a quote from "Wonder Boys": "I mean JESUS, what is it with you Catholics anyway?Â¨. urlLink
urlLink I swear, we didn't do it. No, seriously. It was already there. urlLink
urlLink Is this one of those illusion things where the people in back are really bigger but... eh? It was kind of boring standing in line. urlLink
urlLink For a "global chakra", it has a pretty boring rose window (said the incredulous American). urlLink
urlLink Don't mind the cross. urlLink
urlLink Which do you think is prettier? I think the monks didn't even manage to make a dent in the pretty mountain. PRETTY! urlLink
urlLink Nice view from Monsterrat. Erm, Montserrat. urlLink
urlLink Innocent rocks. Nothing shaped like anything here. No siree Bob. urlLink
urlLink In Catalan "Esglesia Vella", in english "where is the ceiling"? urlLink
urlLink I think you can make drugs out of these, no? urlLink
urlLink Puppies *snicker*. Linguistic difficulties. urlLink
urlLink Dave's pool. Mmm... swamp. urlLink
urlLink On the left, you can see the ghost. His name is Dave. On the right, Andy is wondering why anyone would name a ghost Dave. urlLink
urlLink This was the ghost's house. Apparently the ghost evicted God from his own house. More power to him! urlLink
urlLink The fog is getting thicker. "And Leon is getting largerrrrr."-Airplane urlLink
urlLink There was a ghost there. He told me that soup is trying to take over the world. urlLink
urlLink Welcome to Godthab. Population: 1. urlLink
urlLink Mika on the edge of the abyss. urlLink
urlLink Contemplating a little pointy rock thing. urlLink
urlLink Wanna make a horror film? Here's your set. We rent it out at 250 Euros per day, if you're interested. urlLink
urlLink Foot. We found it at the edge of the cliff. urlLink
urlLink So it's this big slab of rock, and it was cloudy, and everyficiliketoeatpieandlookatmonkeyshavingcake! urlLink
urlLink Creepy kooky daffy wacky nutty looking church. urlLink
urlLink Gremlins watching me. That right there is King Gremlin. urlLink
urlLink It looks like there's a little hand reaching out to pull passers by in. Mwahaha. urlLink
urlLink Don't wash Gremlins. They get mad. And don't pee in their water supply either. urlLink
urlLink Erosion'll take care of this little bugger sooner or later. urlLink
urlLink "Green Hills of Africa"... erm, Spain. urlLink
urlLink Postcard. This time from Spain. Congratulations. urlLink
urlLink Seriously, this one could have come from the Amazon. urlLink
urlLink Another postcard. It's from Heaven, or so they say. I think... urlLink
urlLink ATP. Adenosine Triphosphate, OR All-Terrain Person. urlLink
urlLink I don't know about you, but I haven't seen enough pictures of POOLS yet!!! urlLink
urlLink Peace. Full of waves. You are waves. urlLink
urlLink Don't get him wet, keep him out of bright light, and never feed him after midnight. We warned you. We told you the rules. You didn't listen. http://www.somewhere-else.net/gremlins/ urlLink
urlLink Wanna postcard from Heaven? urlLink
urlLink Uuuuuuh, Gremlin. urlLink
urlLink Moss. Kate Moss. urlLink
urlLink So, the giants were sitting there playing marbles and one of them dropped a marble on Andy's head. That's why he's so crazy. urlLink
urlLink Wanna fly? Valley! urlLink
urlLink Wanna climb? urlLink
urlLink Wanna jump? urlLink
urlLink Be! urlLink
urlLink Andy likes rocks. Woo hoo. urlLink
urlLink It's an interesting hole. Chispa threw the bear who was living there out and took over residence. urlLink
urlLink Clear pool. You could probably drink it. And swim in it. Give birth in it? Maybe. urlLink
urlLink Look it's Mika. There she is. Right there. Yup. And there's water below her. urlLink
urlLink Lothlorien. Sort of. urlLink
urlLink Bye bye dear Chispa. We hardly knew ye. It looks like she's starting a long journey, doncha think? urlLink
